history.created_by: RUN |5 ARTIFACTORY_URL=artifactory-kfs.habana-labs.com VERSION=1.15.0 REVISION=479 REPO_NAME=ubuntu-deb-dev-local PYPI_REPO_NAME=pypi-virtual /bin/sh -c apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends     apt-transport-https     apt-utils     bc     build-essential     ca-certificates     dkms     ethtool     gcc     git     gnupg     gpg-agent     graphviz     libgl1     libgoogle-glog0v5     libjemalloc2     libpq-dev     locales     lsof     make     openssh-client     openssh-server     protobuf-compiler     python3     python3-dev     python3-pip     python3-tk     python3-venv     unzip     vim     libkrb5-3     libgnutls30     wget &&     apt-get autoremove && apt-get clean # buildkit
RUN |5 ARTIFACTORY_URL=artifactory-kfs.habana-labs.com VERSION=1.15.0 REVISION=479 REPO_NAME=ubuntu-deb-dev-local PYPI_REPO_NAME=pypi-virtual /bin/sh -c locale-gen en_US.UTF-8 # buildkit

RUN |5 ARTIFACTORY_URL=artifactory-kfs.habana-labs.com VERSION=1.15.0 REVISION=479 REPO_NAME=ubuntu-deb-dev-local PYPI_REPO_NAME=pypi-virtual /bin/sh -c python3 -m pip install pip==23.3.1 setuptools==67.3.3 wheel==0.38.4 # buildkit

RUN |5 ARTIFACTORY_URL=artifactory-kfs.habana-labs.com VERSION=1.15.0 REVISION=479 REPO_NAME=ubuntu-deb-dev-local PYPI_REPO_NAME=pypi-virtual /bin/sh -c ./install_efa.sh && rm install_efa.sh && rm -rf /etc/ld.so.conf.d/efa.conf /etc/profile.d/efa.sh # buildkit

RUN |5 ARTIFACTORY_URL=artifactory-kfs.habana-labs.com VERSION=1.15.0 REVISION=479 REPO_NAME=ubuntu-deb-dev-local PYPI_REPO_NAME=pypi-virtual /bin/sh -c wget -O- https://${ARTIFACTORY_URL}/artifactory/api/gpg/key/public | gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/habana-artifactory.gpg &&     chown root:root /usr/share/keyrings/habana-artifactory.gpg &&     chmod 644 /usr/share/keyrings/habana-artifactory.gpg  &&     echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/habana-artifactory.gpg] https://${ARTIFACTORY_URL}/artifactory/${REPO_NAME} jammy testing" | tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list &&     apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y habanalabs-rdma-core="$VERSION"-"$REVISION"     habanalabs-thunk="$VERSION"-"$REVISION"     habanalabs-firmware-tools="$VERSION"-"$REVISION"     habanalabs-graph="$VERSION"-"$REVISION" &&     apt-get autoremove --yes && apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* &&     sed --in-place "/$ARTIFACTORY_URL/d" /etc/apt/sources.list # buildkit

RUN |5 ARTIFACTORY_URL=artifactory-kfs.habana-labs.com VERSION=1.15.0 REVISION=479 REPO_NAME=ubuntu-deb-dev-local PYPI_REPO_NAME=pypi-virtual /bin/sh -c wget -nv -O /tmp/libfabric-${LIBFABRIC_VERSION}.tar.bz2 https://github.com/ofiwg/libfabric/releases/download/v${LIBFABRIC_VERSION}/libfabric-${LIBFABRIC_VERSION}.tar.bz2 &&     cd /tmp/ && tar xf /tmp/libfabric-${LIBFABRIC_VERSION}.tar.bz2 &&     cd /tmp/libfabric-${LIBFABRIC_VERSION} &&     ./configure --prefix=$LIBFABRIC_ROOT --enable-psm3-verbs --enable-verbs=yes --with-synapseai=/usr &&     make && make install # buildkit

RUN |5 ARTIFACTORY_URL=artifactory-kfs.habana-labs.com VERSION=1.15.0 REVISION=479 REPO_NAME=ubuntu-deb-dev-local PYPI_REPO_NAME=pypi-virtual /bin/sh -c wget -nv -O /tmp/main.zip https://github.com/HabanaAI/hccl_ofi_wrapper/archive/refs/heads/main.zip &&     unzip /tmp/main.zip -d /tmp &&     cd /tmp/hccl_ofi_wrapper-main &&     make && cp -f libhccl_ofi_wrapper.so /usr/lib/habanalabs/libhccl_ofi_wrapper.so &&     cd / &&     rm -rf /tmp/main.zip /tmp/hccl_ofi_wrapper-main # buildkit

RUN |5 ARTIFACTORY_URL=artifactory-kfs.habana-labs.com VERSION=1.15.0 REVISION=479 REPO_NAME=ubuntu-deb-dev-local PYPI_REPO_NAME=pypi-virtual /bin/sh -c python3 -m pip install habana_media_loader=="${VERSION}"."${REVISION}"     --extra-index-url https://"${ARTIFACTORY_URL}"/artifactory/api/pypi/"${PYPI_REPO_NAME}"/simple # buildkit

RUN |5 ARTIFACTORY_URL=artifactory-kfs.habana-labs.com VERSION=1.15.0 REVISION=479 REPO_NAME=ubuntu-deb-dev-local PYPI_REPO_NAME=pypi-virtual /bin/sh -c mkdir -p /var/run/sshd &&     sed -i 's/[ #]\(.*StrictHostKeyChecking \).*/ \1no/g' /etc/ssh/ssh_config &&     sed -i 's/#\(ForwardAgent \).*/\1yes/g' /etc/ssh/ssh_config &&     echo "    UserKnownHostsFile /dev/null" >> /etc/ssh/ssh_config &&     sed -i 's/#\(StrictModes \).*/\1no/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config &&     echo "/etc/init.d/ssh start \"-p 3022\"" >> ~/.bashrc &&     sed -i '/[ -z "$PS1" ] && return/s/^/#/g' ~/.bashrc # buildkit

RUN |7 PT_VERSION=2.2.0 VERSION=1.15.0 REVISION=479 BASE_NAME=artifactory-kfs.habana-labs.com/docker-local/1.15.0/ubuntu22.04/habanalabs/base-installer ARTIFACTORY_URL=artifactory-kfs.habana-labs.com PT_BUILD_REPO= PYPI_REPO_NAME= /bin/sh -c apt-get update && apt-get install -y     curl     libcurl4     moreutils     iproute2     libcairo2-dev     libglib2.0-dev     libhdf5-dev     libselinux1-dev     libnuma-dev     libpcre2-dev     libjpeg-dev     liblapack-dev     libopenblas-dev     numactl     pdsh     libmkl-dev     libgoogle-perftools-dev &&     apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* # buildkit

RUN |7 PT_VERSION=2.2.0 VERSION=1.15.0 REVISION=479 BASE_NAME=artifactory-kfs.habana-labs.com/docker-local/1.15.0/ubuntu22.04/habanalabs/base-installer ARTIFACTORY_URL=artifactory-kfs.habana-labs.com PT_BUILD_REPO= PYPI_REPO_NAME= /bin/sh -c bash -c "        case $BASE_NAME in             *ubuntu20.04*)                 update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/python python /usr/bin/python3.8 1             ;;             *ubuntu22.04*)                update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/python python /usr/bin/python3.10 1             ;;         esac" # buildkit

RUN |7 PT_VERSION=2.2.0 VERSION=1.15.0 REVISION=479 BASE_NAME=artifactory-kfs.habana-labs.com/docker-local/1.15.0/ubuntu22.04/habanalabs/base-installer ARTIFACTORY_URL=artifactory-kfs.habana-labs.com PT_BUILD_REPO= PYPI_REPO_NAME= /bin/sh -c ./install_packages.sh && rm -f install_packages.sh &&     /sbin/ldconfig && echo "source /etc/profile.d/habanalabs.sh" >> ~/.bashrc # buildkit

RUN |7 PT_VERSION=2.2.0 VERSION=1.15.0 REVISION=479 BASE_NAME=artifactory-kfs.habana-labs.com/docker-local/1.15.0/ubuntu22.04/habanalabs/base-installer ARTIFACTORY_URL=artifactory-kfs.habana-labs.com PT_BUILD_REPO= PYPI_REPO_NAME= /bin/sh -c rm -rf /tmp/* # buildkit
